mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AccountBook ORDER BY accountbook_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE AccountBook SET member_id = #{memberId}, transaction_date = #{transactionDate}, category = #{category}, amount = #{amount}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, payment_method = #{paymentMethod}, updated_at = now() WHERE accountbook_id = #{accountBookId}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(amount) FROM AccountBook WHERE description = #{description} AND transaction_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW() ,'%Y-%m-01') AND LAST_DAY(NOW())
